features.name: Spellcasting
features.description:
The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared: 

â¢ Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
â¢ 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
â¢ 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion
â¢ 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
â¢ 4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm
â¢ 5th level (1 slot): cone of cold

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
